attributes.action: Same generosity in A-level and GCSE exam grade boundaries for 2022
attributes.additional_details: Because you are the only people who can do it alongside with Ofqual
attributes.background: Due to the extreme amount of uncertainty students have faced throughout the year some having to isolate and now the national lockdown all student are having to face the challenges of online learning it’s in the best interest that students should receive the same generosity as 2019 and 2020 students.

rejection.details:
We understand you want students to be shown some "generosity" when it comes to grade boundaries for 2022 GCSE and A-level exams, however it's not clear what you mean by this.

You might like to sign this petition which calls on the Government to clarify arrangements for 2022 exams, potentially to include defined changes to grade boundaries: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569

Exam arrangements and the current coronavirus pandemic can cause worry and stress. You can find information on how to deal with stress here:  

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk 

Children’s Society: https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/mental-health-advice-for-children-and-young-people/issues-affecting-young-people   

Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/info-advice/your-feelings/anxiety-stress-panic/coping-with-stress/
